title: Rui Costa
summary: Rui Manuel César Costa OIH (Portuguese pronunciation: [ʁuj ˈkɔʃtɐ]; born 29 March 1972) is a Portuguese former professional footballer who is the 34th president of sports club S.L. Benfica.[1] He also succeeded Luís Filipe Vieira as president of the club's SAD board of directors.
